title: It didn't have to happen
brief_description: Illustrates how the careless worker who scorns safety devices on modern machinery endangers not only his own life but the lives of fellow workers. It portrays a careless employee and the tragic result of his slipshod methods. Designed to show employers in industry why guards are put on machines and how they should be used.
